summary: The module adds accessor classes that extend unstructured grid and data array objects with spatial subsetting methods. Users can extract portions of a grid or its associated data using geometric filters such as bounding boxes, circles, polygons, or nearest‑neighbor point queries, leveraging an internal spatial index for fast cell location.
business_intent: Enable efficient extraction of relevant subsets from large unstructured grid datasets, supporting analysis, visualization, and downstream processing by providing convenient, high‑performance spatial selection tools.
